00001 using System;
00002 using System.Collections.Generic;
00003 
00004 namespace Vnvd
00005 {
00009         public class SymbolTable : ISymTab
00010         {
00011                 private Dictionary<String, Stack<IdEntry>> entries;
00012                 private Stack<List<String>> cache;
00013 
00017                 public SymbolTable()
00018                 {
00019                         this.entries = new Dictionary<String, Stack<IdEntry>>();
00020                         this.cache = new Stack<List<String>>();
00021                 }
00022 
00026                 public void OpenScope()
00027                 {
00028                         this.cache.Push(new List<String>());
00029                 }
00030 
00034                 public void CloseScope()
00035                 {
00036                         List<String> toKill = this.cache.Pop();
00037 
00038                         foreach (String dood in toKill)
00039                         {
00040                                 this.entries[dood].Pop();
00041                         }
00042                 }
00043 
00047                 public int CurrentLevel
00048                 {
00049                         get
00050                         {
00051                                 return this.cache.Count;
00052                         }
00053                 }
00054 
00058                 public bool Open
00059                 {
00060                         get
00061                         {
00062                                 return (this.cache.Count != 0);
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065 
00072                 public void Enter(String id, IdEntry entry)
00073                 {
00074 
00075                         entry.Level = this.CurrentLevel;
00076 
00077                         if (this.cache.Peek().Contains(id))
00078                         {
00079                                 throw new SymbolTableException("Variable already declared for current scope: " + id);
00080                         }
00081 
00082                         if (!entries.ContainsKey(id))
00083                         {
00084                                 entries[id] = new Stack<IdEntry>();
00085                         }
00086                         cache.Peek().Add(id);
00087                         entries[id].Push(entry);
00088                 }
00089 
00096                 public IdEntry Retrieve(String id)
00097                 {
00098                    return this.entries.ContainsKey(id) && this.entries[id].Count > 0 ? this.entries[id].Peek() : null;
00099                 }
00100         }
00101

00106         {
00111                 public SymbolTableException(String msg) : base(msg)
00112                 {
00113                 }
00114         }
